title: Nayab Chowhan, DO Reston
cleaned_text: Univ. Sees ages 18+ Doctors of Osteopathic Medicine, or DOs, are fully licensed and board-certified physicians who practice in all areas of medicine. DOs emphasize a whole-person approach to treatment and receive extra training in the musculoskeletal system called osteopathic manipulative treatment (OMT). DOs at One Medical typically practice in the field of family medicine, geriatrics, pediatrics, or internal medicine, and may also integrate OMT. I use a whole-body, integrative approach focused on collaborating with patients to help them achieve their wellness goals. I especially enjoy working with patients who want to pursue approaches that encourage a healthier lifestyle and reduce less-invasive treatment methods when possible. How I stay healthy and happy Spending time with family, cooking, exercise, reading, and travel. Education DeBusk College of Osteopathic Medicine Residency Nassau University Medical Center Board certification Other, American Osteopathic Board of Family Physicians Other languages spoken Urdu Goes by Nayab Pronouns She,
